page.shortlink: api httpd license activate function source
page.description: Activates the specified Application Server license
page.prototype: Result as L = httpd_license_activate(license as C [,show_ui as L])

argument.name: show_ui
argument.description: Defaut = .t.. Whether or not a dialog should be shown with information about the activation result.

return.name: Result
return.description: Whether or not the operation was successful.
